displayName: Ensure the 'ALTER SYSTEM' Audit Option Is Enabled
rationale: Any unauthorized attempt to alter the system should be cause for concern. Alterations outside of some specified maintenance window may be of concern. In forensics, these audit records could be quite useful.
recommended_action:
To remediate this setting, execute the following SQL statement in either the non multi-tenant or container database, it does NOT need run in the pluggable.
```
AUDIT ALTER SYSTEM;
```
error_message: 'ALTER SYSTEM' audit option is not enabled
ruleNames: Ensure the 'ALTER SYSTEM' Audit Option Is Enabled
